title: The electric distribution cables wiring shall be laid in a separate duct
clause_text: The electric distribution cables wiring shall be laid in a separate duct. The duct shall be sealed at every floor with non-combustible materials having the same fire resistance as that of the duct.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The electric distribution cables wiring shall be laid in a separate duct. The duct shall be sealed at every floor with non-combustible materials having the same fire resistance as that of the duct.
